title: Immediately after firing, a neuron is incapable...

content.question: Shao Mae takes medication to relieve depression. The medication increases her neural activity. However, immediately after firing, a neuron is incapable of responding to stimulation for a short time. Which of the following describes the brief time period when the neuron is unable to fire?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
